title: Women's Theatre
description: Examination of a variety of female theatre artists from the Greeks to the present and the socio-political contexts from which they emerged. Analysis of a variety of classic and contemporary playscripts emphasizing evolving visions of women. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE C4 except for Theatre Arts majors. Fulfills USCP.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Areas A and C3 (TH 210 recommended); TH 210, TH 227, or TH 228 for Theatre majors
